questions.question: Do you have a fever over 100.3?
Do you have any of the following signs or symptoms?

answers.6: New loss or decrease in sense of taste or smell

questions.question: Have you travelled or have had close contact with anyone who has travelled in the past 14 days?
Have you had close contact with anyone with respiratory illness or a confirmed or probable/suspected case of COVI19?

Did you wear the required and/or recommended PPE according to the type of duties you were performing (e.g. goggles, gloves, mask and gown or N95 with aerosol generating medical procedures when you had close contact with a suspected or confirmed case of COVI19?
